title: Trapp Ikka Monogatari (The Trapp Family Story)
synopsis: Based on the same story that produced the classic musical 'The Sound of Music', this is the story of Maria, who leaves her life in a convent to take up the responsibility of taking care of Captain Trapp's children.
characters: ['Kutschera, Maria', 'von Trapp, Rupert', 'von Trapp, Martina', 'von Trapp, Maria', 'von Trapp, Agathe', 'von Trapp, Werner ', 'von Trapp, Hedwig', 'von Trapp, Johanna', 'von Trapp, Georg', 'Rafaela']
